sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './css/MessageTo.css' import { Row, Col ,Stack} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { updateSenderStatus } from '../../../features/Messages' const MessageTo = ({socket}) => { const sendTo = useSelector(state=>state.msgSlice.MessageHeader.sendTo) const [status ,setStatus] = useState(); socket.on("typing", data=>{ setStatus("typing...") }) return (
{sendTo}
{status}
) } export default MessageTo
